item.description:
NEW LOCATION

Official NHC COED Softball Team will be holding a team practice/ pickup game on Saturday, April, 28th, 2007, at 12pm at Masotta Field in East Haven, CT. Approx 5 miles from downtown New Haven. Normal game nights will be Thursday starting in May.

For those players who have not attended practice regularly, please try to attend at least one practice a week.

If you are not a team member and are interested in playing softball for fun or getting some sun and exercise, you are welcome as well.

Masotta Field is located at 311 Foxon Road, RT 80 (Deer Run Elementary School)

Deer Run Elementary School: (311 Foxon Road -Rt. 80)
1. Take I-91 to Exit 8 (Rt. 80).
2. Turn north at end of exit.
3. Travel up Rt. 80 past Our Lady of Pompeii Church.
4. Turn at second left into school.

Mapquest Directions
item.name: NHC SOFTBALL TEAM PRACTICE ** LOCATION CHANGE
